attributes.background: Poland. What came to your mind? I bet it was immigrant. Through history, Poland has been undermined in its successes. The hard working Poles are charming and diligent. May I just mention, that it wasn't Alan Turing that cracked the enigma code, but a group of Polish people. WE ARE UNDERRATED.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
